Plot: A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job and her students is forced to return to her job to make enough money for a boob job after her rich fiancé dumps her.
Title: Bad Teacher
Actors: Cameron Diaz, Lucy Punch, Jason Segel, Justin Timberlake
tomatoConsensus: In spite of a promising concept and a charmingly brazen performance from Cameron Diaz, Bad Teacher is never as funny as it should be.
